Reference

All functions

Create the R OBS Websocket object

GetCurrentPreviewScene()

Asks for the name of the current preview scene

GetCurrentProgramScene()

Asks for the name of the current program scene

GetGroupList()

Gets the list of all groups

GetSceneItemList()

ask for a list of the items

GetSceneList()

ask for a list of the scenes

GetSceneSceneTransitionOverride()

Gets the scene "transition override" for a scene.

R OBS Websocket Class
